# [Interview #24: LOC Signing Report - Erica Sadun, Entry #14](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=24#14)

#### Question

Will we see Jain Farstrider?

#### Robert Jordan

Read the books. If he's not seen by the last page, he's not in there.
